title: Vladislav Nosenko
text:
Vladislav Nosenko (; born 22 July 1969) is an Azerbaijani former professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
Club career.
Nosenko started his career with <a href="%C5%9Eirvan%20K%C3%BCrd%C9%99mir%20FK">Chiatura</a> in 1990 and then he moved to <a href="%C5%9Eirvan%20K%C3%BCrd%C9%99mir%20FK">Chiatura</a>. In 1991 he moved to <a href="FC%20Baku">Baku</a> then in <a href="%C5%9Eirvan%20K%C3%BCrd%C9%99mir%20FK">Chiatura</a> and in <a href="Neft%C3%A7i%20PFK">Neftçi</a>. In 1992 he moved to <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine</a> on the side of <a href="FC%20Kryvbas%20Kryvyi%20Rih%20%282020%29">Kryvbas Kryvyi Rih</a>, <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Zaporizhzhia">Torpedo Zaporizhzhia</a>, <a href="FC%20HU%20ZIDMU-Spartak%20Zaporizhzhia">Viktor Zaporizhzhia</a> and <a href="FC%20Zirka%20Kropyvnytskyi">Zirka Kropyvnytskyi</a>. In 1999 he played for <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Zaporizhzhia">Torpedo Zaporizhzhia</a> and <a href="FC%20Zirka-2%20Kirovohrad">Zirka-2 Kirovohrad</a>. In 200 he played for <a href="FC%20Zirka%20Kropyvnytskyi">Zirka Kropyvnytskyi</a> and <a href="Dinaburg%20FC">Dinaburg</a>. In 2002 he moved to <a href="FC%20Desna%20Chernihiv">Desna Chernihiv</a> the main club in the city of <a href="Chernihiv">Chernihiv</a> where he played 22 matches and scored 1 goal. He also played 1 match for <a href="FC%20Zorya%20Luhansk">Zorya Luhansk</a> and 9 matches for <a href="FC%20Bolat">Bolat</a>.
International career.
Nosenko earned seven caps for the <a href="Azerbaijan%20national%20football%20team">Azerbaijan national team</a> between 1995 and 1997.
External links.
